name: Synthwave Shooter (TheJackOfClubs)
description:
Switch between controlling the two connected ships to defeat the enemies. You can only control one ship at a time, so must switch control from one to the other in order to keep both out of danger.

The arena is scattered with specs of energy, which the inactive ship must collect in order for you to be able to shoot. When you run out of energy in one location, you will need to switch which ship is active to collect more from a different area. Enemies drop energy when destroyed.

Made for the Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022

Controls

  • WASD - move the active ship
  • Q - switch control to the other ship
  • E (hold) - heal the inactive ship (consumes energy!)
  • Space - a speed boost to the active ship with a short cooldown
  • Mouse + click - aim and shoot with the active ship

Known Bug

The dynamic split screen (which triggers when the two ships are far apart) doesn't work properly in some places and displays the ships too close to the edge of the screen before jumping back to the correct display.
